cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to 999 (invalid MCC value) will cause PLMN configuration failure and prevent network attachment.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to 100 dBm (valid range -60 to 50 dBm) will cause power configuration validation failure and prevent SSB transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為 100 dBm（有效範圍 -60 到 50 dBm）會導致功率配置驗證失敗，並阻止 SSB 傳輸。
